remarks: Distributive law for inner product (left-distributivity). (Contributed by NM, 20-Nov-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
statement:
phlsrng.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
phllmhm.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
phllmhm.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ipdir.g $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
ipdir.p $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` F ) $.
ipdi $p |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( A ., ( B .+ C ) ) = ( ( A ., B ) .+^ ( A ., C ) ) ) $.
